Event.name: Storing
Event.definition: <def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> has placed a <fen>Theme</fen> in an accessible but somewhat out of the way <fen>Location</fen> for the purposes of maintaining it free from harm and illegitimate use while it is not being used.</def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> is the person who has placed the <fen>Theme</fen> in the <fen>Location</fen>.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Theme
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Theme</fen> is the object that is kept in a <fen>Location</fen> by the <fen>Agent</fen></def-root>

Arg.name: Location
Arg.definition: <def-root>The location where the <fen>Theme</fen> is kept. Some, though not all, LUs in this frame incorporate this FE. </def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition:
<def-root>Any description of the storing state which is not covered by more specific FEs, including general descriptions comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>) and salient characteristics of an <fen>Agent</fen> that also affect the action (<ment>deliberately</ment>, <ment>carefully</ment>).
</def-root>

Arg.name: Depictive
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies any <fen>Depictive</fen> phrase describing the <fen>Agent</fen> or <fen>Theme</fen> of the storing event.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Duration</fen> is the amount of time for which the <fen>Theme</fen> remains in the <fen>Location</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> denotes a proposition from which the storing event logically follows. </def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition:
<def-root><fen>Time</fen> is the time period during which the <fen>Theme</fen> is stored.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Area
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Area</fen> is the setting into which a mass <fen>Theme</fen> is placed.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Co-participant
Arg.definition: <def-root><fen>Co-participant</fen> is an entity that participates in a coordinated way in the storing event either as a co-agent or a co-theme.</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition:
<def-root>An action that the <fen>Agent</fen> intends to accomplish by perform the storing action.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Frequency
Arg.definition: <def-root>This frame element is defined as the number of times an event occurs per some unit of time. </def-root>

lexUnit.name: cellar.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: store in a cellar (often said of wine or beer).

lexUnit.name: stock.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: keep with the intention of later use.
